description: This file defines the AppEnv class providing static methods to access environment variables related to the application configuration, such as API base URL, timeout, and theme name, with default values if not specified.

classes.name: AppEnv
classes.description: A class containing static accessor methods for environment variables used in the app.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables or a default value if not set.

methods.name: apiTimeoutMs
methods.description: Returns the API timeout in milliseconds from environment variables or a default value if not set.

methods.name: themeName
methods.description: Returns the theme name from environment variables or a default value if not set.
